tool_description: This  contains  products  that  can be  consumed in your  projects
name: REAL STORE
title: REAL STORE

api_list.name: Get  Search ProductResults
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-store.p.rapidapi.com/search/pet supplies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://real-store.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
